name: Light Cheese
description:
Light cheese is a game about a ball name Joseph who really likes cheese and they'll anything for cheese, going as far as to risk their own life for cheese. Travel through the moon caves past Hot Cubes, Jelly and Old Copper Springs to collect the Giant cheese orb at the end. Warning: This game is short, bad and has the weirdest boss fight ever...

To summarise the description: Collect yellow cheese and avoid bad red things!
